fileDownloadError: Could not download requested file, please check your link and permissions
loadingError: Could not load the requested item
passwordHelpText: Repeat your password twice to verify
displayNameHelpText: Shown instead of username when applicable
changeEmailMailText: You received this message because you or someone else has defined your email address as the primary email on the website.
changeEmailMailNotice: If you did not expect this change, you probably received this message by mistake. In that case, please just ignore this email. Otherwise please confirm.
restorePasswordMailText: You received this message because you or someone else has requested to change a password on the website.
restorePasswordMailNotice: If you did not expect this change, you probably received this message by mistake. In that case, please just ignore this email. Otherwise please confirm.
invalidID: Your link to change the password is not valid anymore, please request a new one
activationError: Error during the activation procedure. The action may have been performed previously, or the link is not valid due to expiration. Please try requesting the action again.
activationSuccessEmail: The new email address has been successfully saved for your profile as your primary email address.
activationSuccessUser: Your user account has been successfully activated. You can sign in to the site using the username and password you entered during registration.
passwordChange: Please fill out the form below to set a new password for your account.
passwordChangeSuccess: The password change procedure has been successfully completed. You can log in to the site using your username and new password.
